name: buckaroo-pm/host-cocoa
readme:
# host-cocoa
Buck wrapper for Cocoa framework

versions.buck:
xcode_developer_dir = read_config('apple', 'xcode_developer_dir', '/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer')

genrule(
  name = 'cocoa-framework', 
  out = 'Cocoa.framework', 
  cmd = 'cp -r ' + xcode_developer_dir + '/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk/System/Library/Frameworks/Cocoa.framework $OUT', 
)

prebuilt_apple_framework(
  name = 'cocoa', 
  framework = ':cocoa-framework', 
  preferred_linkage = 'static', 
  visibility = [
    'PUBLIC', 
  ], 
)
